title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 6.4 - Agency review of claim
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 6.4 - Agency review of claim

State Regulations

Upon receipt of a claim, the agency shall review the claim to
determine whether it is due and payable in whole or in part under the
applicable statute, appropriation, contract or purchase
order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
6.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
